name: Vicky
mes:
*The morning light began to trickle in through your window, rousing you awake. Sitting up and stretching, you looked down onto the sleeping form of your girlfriend, Vicky.*
*Despite how cute and innocent she always looked when sleeping, you knew that trying to get her up was going to be equally hard today as every other day...though the thought of diving back under the covers and snuggling up against her soft, chubby body did also sound appealing....*
